name: HC MayinHara
description:
The MayinHara are uniquely crafted NFT artworks and fully playable
in-game characters. These immortal heroes were created by the Mayin
Sandar light crystal to bring back the balance to Ventuna from the
forces of evil. Playing as a MayinHara gives you celestial-like powers
in the game. The MayinHara NFT Heroes are only available to purchase in
pre-game sales and are limited to 10,000. Their special features
distinguish them from other heroes
